title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS/Linux that pulls and runs GGUF models (Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete, embeddings, JSON mode, streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, markdown, code highlight).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, pull, list, copy, delete, streaming responses.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama API (generate, chat, pull, push, list, delete).

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Lightweight Go CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API for quick chat/generate from terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds GitHub-Copilot-like inline completions powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Terminal pair-programmer inspired by OpenAI Codex but backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU & CPU modes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama in containers (CPU & CUDA).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama API with async chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client crate for Ollama with Tokio-based async, streaming support, and typed requests.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles for running niche & fine-tuned weights with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local docs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with locally hosted Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript client package on npm; zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS builds.
